name: Platformer(yet to be named) look see
name_original: Platformer(yet to be named) look see
description:
this game is to show you the current physics of a full-fledged steam release.in about a year or so i will release it.so don't trash talk me on this. The steam full version will be complete with animations , characters , guns ,enemies, and overall better gameplay and physics thx :D. i know this is a bit of a disappointment from the last one, but that was just me following a unity tutorial and i had no idea what i was doing, but this one is sure gonna have better gameplay once ive finished it.

Peace!!
